column3: Considering the evidence  of this  case,  we  decide  to vary the
sentence  and  the  jail  term  ordered  for  the  1st  charge  which  is
suspended for 5 years.  The fine will remains as it is.

The sentence for the 2 nd  charge 
is suspended  for 5 years.

Subject  to 
the  above  variation  the  judgment  of  the  High
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
